result.eng: She was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.
result.ga: Bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déanta
result.orig: Bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déanta
result.html: Bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déantaShe was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ar buile nuair a ċuala sí naċ raiḃ an obair déantaShe was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.

result.eng: It will be done in its own proper time.
result.ga: Déanfar in am agus i dtráth é
result.orig: Déanfar in am agus i dtráth é
result.html: Déanfar in am agus i dtráth éIt will be done in its own proper time.
result.ponchtml: Déanfar in am agus i dtráṫ éIt will be done in its own proper time.

result.eng: I promise you that it will be done.
result.ga: Geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déanta
result.orig: Geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déanta
result.html: Geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déantaI promise you that it will be done.
result.ponchtml: Geallaim duit go mbeiḋ sé déantaI promise you that it will be done.

result.html: Maith thúWell done!
result.ponchtml: Maiṫ ṫúWell done!

result.ga: Níl sé déanta i gceart agat
result.orig: Níl sé déanta i gceart agat
result.html: Níl sé déanta i gceart agatYou haven't done it properly.
result.ponchtml: Níl sé déanta i gceart agatYou haven't done it properly.

result.eng: Most of the work is done.
result.ga: Tá an chuid is mó den obair déanta
result.orig: Tá an chuid is mó den obair déanta
result.html: Tá an chuid is mó den obair déantaMost of the work is done.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuid is mó den obair déantaMost of the work is done.

result.eng: A lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.
result.ga: Tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainn
result.orig: Tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainn
result.html: Tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainnA lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.
result.ponchtml: Tá neart oibre fós le déanaṁ sna blianta amaċ roṁainnA lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.

result.html: Tá sé déanta cheanaIt's done already.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé déanta ċeanaIt's done already.

result.ga: Tá sé déanta go maith agat
result.orig: Tá sé déanta go maith agat
result.html: Tá sé déanta go maith agatYou have done it well.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé déanta go maiṫ agatYou have done it well.

result.ga: Tá sé sin déanta cheana féin
result.orig: Tá sé sin déanta cheana féin
result.html: Tá sé sin déanta cheana féinThat one is done already.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sin déanta ċeana féinThat one is done already.

result.eng: They were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ga: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-EabhracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoṫas ag fógairt go raiḃ eitleán tar éis doċar a ḋéanaṁ d'ḟoirgneaṁ i Nua-EaḃracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.

result.eng: This was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ga: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráice
result.orig: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráice
result.html: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a ḃfeictear na mílte saiġdiúirí Meiriceánaċa gaċ lá anois ar a mbealaċ ċun na hIaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.

result.eng: Not tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ga: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.orig: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.html: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aigeNot tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ponchtml: Ċan dólás croí aċ sólás croí a ḃí ar Ṡéimí nuair a ḃí a ḟaoiside déanta aigeNot tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.

result.eng: My Lord knows what I've done.
result.ga: Tá a fhios ag mo Thiarna orm
result.orig: Tá a fhios ag mo Thiarna orm
result.html: Tá a fhios ag mo Thiarna ormMy Lord knows what I've done.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios ag mo Ṫiarna ormMy Lord knows what I've done.

result.eng: How little is what you have done worth to you?
result.ga: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agat
result.orig: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agat
result.html: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agatHow little is what you have done worth to you?
result.ponchtml: Cá beag duit a ḃfuil déanta agatHow little is what you have done worth to you?
